strings.question: Question
strings.task_description: The test will consist of few questions. Each question will have a few options. Every option you choose will carry a score which will be added up to give you your final score.

alert.select_before_moving: Please select an option before moving to next question
alert.delete: Are you sure you want to delete the task from your hisotry?
alert.agreement: I agree to the terms and condition and provide full consent to the health provider to use that for research and diagnosis purpose only.
alert.exit: Are you sure you want to exit the app?
alert.back: Are you sure you want to go back?

splash.slide2_description: This is a powerful tool for assisting primary care clinicians in diagnosing depression as well as selecting and monitoring treatment.
splash.slide3_title: Have you been feeling nervous or worrying too much about something?
splash.slide4_title: Do you frequently interrupt people while talking?
splash.slide5_title: Do you have difficulty waiting your turn?
splash.slide6_title: Do you have difficulties to remember appointments, meetings or any obligations?

home.title: GAD 7
home.caption: This easy-to-use self-administered patient questionnaire is used as a screening tool and severity measure for generalised anxiety disorder (GAD)

mct.worry_title_placeholder: Write what are you worried about...
mct.worry_describe: Describe what are you worrying about
mct.worry_describe_placeholder: Write what are you worrying about...
